bug.author: aniqueakhtar
bug.description:
<denchmark-code>out.tensor_stride = [2]*3
File "/home/anique/anaconda3/envs/mink2/lib/python3.7/site-packages/MinkowskiEngine/MinkowskiTensor.py", line 358, in tensor_stride self.coordinate_map_key.set_tensor_stride(p) AttributeError: 'MinkowskiEngineBackend._C.CoordinateMapKey' object has no attribute 'set_tensor_stride' </denchmark-code>
Whenever I manually assign a stride using tensor_stride, I get this error

comments.comment: The modification of the tensor stride does not propagate to the coordinate manager. Thus, I had to prevent this to prevent unpredictable behaviors on <denchmark-link:https://github.com/NVIDIA/MinkowskiEngine/commit/289e9a38e9f53a5407fa28f8524bae835a94e002>289e9a3</denchmark-link> . Instead, when you create a sparse tensor, provide the tensor stride as a keword argument.
